metadataAttributes.Title: Inventory Analytics
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Inventory analytics is the corner stone of supply chain analytics. A company in trade industries may have 30-50% of their assets tied up in inventory. An effective inventory management can improve revenue by increasing product variety and availability, and reduce cost and speed up cash cycle by reducing excessive inventory and waste.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Inventory Control,Data Analysis,Sales And Operations Planning,Supply Chain,
